text: Gabriele Geißler (later Orgis, 1 November 1944 – 14 June 2006), was a female East German international table tennis player. She won a silver medal at the 1969 World Table Tennis Championships in the women's singles. Between 1963 and 1980 she was nine times East German national champion. ==See also== * List of table tennis players * List of World Table Tennis Championships medalists ==References== Category:1944 births Category:2006 deaths Category:German female table tennis players Category:Sportspeople from Dresden Category:World Table Tennis Championships medalists
title: Gabriele Geißler
